title: Cowboystudio 4-Channel Radio Remote Trigger with 2 Receivers for Studio Strobe
description: This trigger is designed for photographic studio and on-location work to trigger various flash lights and strobes. This pack is composed of one 4-channel trigger and two self-locking radio receiver. The transmitter is to be attached on the hot shoe of the camera while the receiver is to be plugged into the studio flash. Each receiver works with one studio flash.Micro-computer controlTriggering delay is 1/1600 secondFour channels that work without interference with each otherReceivers search channels automaticallyLong lifetime of trigger battery, one year or over 20,000 continuous triggersReceivers each use two AAA batteries (not included) with power switchsWorking indication: LED3.5, 6.35 adapterMaximum effective area: 15m (open area without interference)
